mireka.filter
Interface FilterBase

All Known Subinterfaces:
DataRecipientFilter, Filter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataRecipientFilter, AbstractFilter, AcceptAllRecipient, AcceptDomainPostmaster, AcceptGlobalPostmaster, AcceptPostmaster, DataRecipientFilterAdapter, ProhibitRelaying, RefuseUnknownRecipient, SavePostmasterMail, StatelessFilterType, StopLoop
public interface FilterBase

don't implement this interface directly, use the descendant interfaces and the implementing abstract classes

Method Summary
 void begin()
           
 void data(MailData data)
           
 void done()
          it is always called, even if some other filter failed or no mail was delivered in this mail transaction
 void from(java.lang.String from)
           
 void recipient(Recipient recipient)
          it is only called if one of the filters accepted the recipient in verifyRecipient(mireka.mailaddress.Recipient)
 FilterReply verifyRecipient(Recipient recipient)
          it is not called if a previous filter has already accepted the recipient
